title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Pie Recipe
full_text:
Chocolate Chip Cookie Pie Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Cook
20 mins
Active
20 mins
Total
30 mins
Serves
8
to 10 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
flour
1/2
teaspoon
baking soda
1/2
teaspoon
salt
8
tablespoons
unsalted butter
, at room temperature
1/4
cup packed
light brown sugar
1/2
cup
sugar
1/2
teaspoon
vanilla extract
1
egg
1/2
cup
chocolate chips
Directions
Preheat oven to 375°F. Grease a 9 inch pie dish.
In a small bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, beat together butter, brown sugar, and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add vanilla and eggs and beat until combined.
Add flour mixture to wet ingredients and beat until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips.
Press dough evenly across prepared pie dish. Bake until golden, about 20 minutes.
